comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
I am not sure how to reproduce this bug, but it came up when I was editing web.xml, that was lacking a role-name tag from auth-constraint tag. Please see more information for stack trace

This isn't actually a duplicate of bug 136902, but the fix for that bug included the NPE reported here, so this should be fixed for WTP 1.5.3 & WTP 2.0.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 136902 ***
